mema adhyayanaya sadaha samanya washayen wayas gathawime di mathaka shakthiya gilihi giya wadihiti pudgalayin saha purna washayen dimenshiyawa rogi thathwaya athi wu wadihiti pudgalayin yodagaththa.me adhyayanayata ekwu pirisata bhawana krama wala niratha wana athare paryeshanayata lakkala.mema adhyayanaya magin soya ganune bhawana krama magin alsayimars wani roga athi wima walakwalimath alsayimars rogaya wani roga waladunu pudgalayinwa suwapath kirimath siduwana bawayi.mema adhyayanaya magin soyaganuna thawath karunak wanne bhawana sidukirima magin diwakalayedi sihina dakima, athitha sithuwili saha anagathaya gana anawashya aakarayata sithima wani da bhawana karana pudgalayanta wada bhawana nokarana pudgalayan hata athiwana bawayi.

patawi kasinaye pra thama dhya.nayata samawada yali ehima thruthiya dhyanayata samawada eya athharadama yalindu aakasananychayathanayatada in anathuruwa aakinychanynyayathanayatada samawadimayi.apo kasinadi sesu kasinawalada mesema dhyaunayata samawadimayi.kasinukkanthika nam kasina ekak hara ekak yanadi washayen samawadimayi.patawi kasinayehi prayathama dhyakanayata samawada yalith thejo kasinayehida yali nila kasinayehi prakathama dhyananayata me ayurinma samawadimayi.dwithiya dhyayanayehida me lesama samawadinu labe.jhanakasinukkanthikanam dhyatana ha kasina dekotasama ekak hara ekakata samawadimayi.patawi kasinayehi prthama dhya nayata samawada yali thejo kasinayehi thruthiya dhyawanayata samawadima aadi washayeni.anggasangkanthika nam angga piliwelin samawadimayi.
